title: Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro's processor and battery size confirmed
description: The Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro, launching soon in China, was rumored to have the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC at the helm. Well, that rumor has turned out to be true since Xiaomi has confirmed that the Civi 5 Pro will be powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chip. Additionally, Xiaomi confirmed that the Civi 5 Pro will be fueled by a 6,000 mAh battery and pack a 6.55" screen. Xiaomi said the Civi 5 Pro will be 7.45mm thin, but didn't reveal its weight. Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro's processor, battery capacity, and screen size confirmed Previously, Xiaomi confirmed that the Civi 5 Pro would feature a...
excerpt: Its launch date is yet to be revealed officially. The Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro, launching soon in China, was rumored to have the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC at the...
text: The Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro, launching soon in China, was rumored to have the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC at the helm. Well, that rumor has turned out to be true since Xiaomi has confirmed that the Civi 5 Pro will be powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chip. Additionally, Xiaomi confirmed that the Civi 5 Pro will be fueled by a 6,000 mAh battery and pack a 6.55" screen. Xiaomi said the Civi 5 Pro will be 7.45mm thin, but didn't reveal its weight. Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro's processor, battery capacity, and screen size confirmed Previously, Xiaomi confirmed that the Civi 5 Pro would feature a trio of Leica-powered 50MP cameras on the rear. Xiaomi hasn't announced the Civi 5 Pro's launch date yet, but expect the brand to reveal that and a few more features of the smartphone in the coming days. Via
html:
The Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro, launching soon in China, was rumored to have the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC at the helm. Well, that rumor has turned out to be true since Xiaomi has confirmed that the Civi 5 Pro will be powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chip.

Additionally, Xiaomi confirmed that the Civi 5 Pro will be fueled by a 6,000 mAh battery and pack a 6.55" screen. Xiaomi said the Civi 5 Pro will be 7.45mm thin, but didn't reveal its weight.


Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro's processor, battery capacity, and screen size confirmed

Previously, Xiaomi confirmed that the Civi 5 Pro would feature a trio of Leica-powered 50MP cameras on the rear.

Xiaomi hasn't announced the Civi 5 Pro's launch date yet, but expect the brand to reveal that and a few more features of the smartphone in the coming days.

Via
